Package cell

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
cell.Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cell extends Object implements Serializable
GridCell class: Singular grid cells will be stored alongside methods that will edit the content of those cells.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cell

      public Cell(int x, int y)
      GridCell constructor: default state empty
      Parameters:
      x - = horizontal axis (left 0... right n)
      y - = vertical axis (top 0... bottom n) maybe change that order and display from bottom to top (through reverse recursion)
